name: PROJECT VELOCITY
description:
PROJECT VELOCITY is a Bullet Hell and Endless Runner where the speed never stops rising, and the obstacles never stop coming. Fight and cruise your way through endlessly spawning obstructions and bosses that increase in difficulty as you accelerate to achieve the highest velocity you can! To overcome these challenges, you'll find powerups to increase your various capabilities, vastly improving your performance at higher speeds.

In PROJECT VELOCITY, the only rules are to be quick and cunning. Simple enough, but a lot more tough.
